structure.unit: ARTICLE X. LOCAL BUSINESS TAX RECEIPT IN UNINCORPORATED AREAS

law.catch_line: Junk dealers; local business tax requirements.

text.section:
Sec. 8A-237. Junk dealers; local business tax requirements.
Every person engaged in business as a scrap metal processor as defined in Section 8A-9.1 shall pay a local business tax as provided for in the schedule of taxes, Section 8A-247.1
Every person engaged in business as a junk dealer as defined in Section 8A-9.1 shall pay a local business tax as provided for in the schedule of taxes, Section 8A-247.1
